name: Dot Dodger
description:
A very simple game about dodging a never-ending onslaught of enemy dots.  Here's the lowdown:

  • You're a Blue Dot (with a sweet 'stache!)
  • You're being attacked by Red Dots (with gnarly teeth!)
  • Green Dots give you bonuses

Survive for as long as possible and try to get the high score!
